findings.message:
CRITICAL: Ratio Implementation:Tests desequilibrado (46 implementaciones : 1 tests). 
        
WORKFLOW BDDTDDIMPLEMENTATION VIOLADO:
- BDD: 0 features
- TDD: 1 tests (INSUFICIENTES)
- Implementation: 46 archivos (DEMASIADOS sin tests)

TDD requiere: Tests primero, luego implementacin. Ratio ideal: Tests >= Implementation.

ACCIN REQUERIDA:
- Escribir tests para cada implementacin
- No crear nueva implementacin sin tests correspondientes
- Seguir flujo: Feature  Tests  Implementation
Tests sin feature files BDD. Workflow debe empezar con especificaciones de comportamiento.

Multiple retry logic without circuit breaker - prevents cascading failures
findings.suggestion: Implement circuit breaker pattern: opossum library or custom implementation

context.impact: HIGH - prevents system overload when backend down

findings.message: Multiple retry logic without circuit breaker - prevents cascading failures
findings.suggestion: Implement circuit breaker pattern: opossum library or custom implementation

context.impact: HIGH - prevents system overload when backend down

findings.message: Network calls without timeout - rural connections can hang indefinitely
findings.suggestion: Add timeout: { timeout: 30000 } or AbortController with 30s timeout

context.recommendation: 30s timeout for API calls, 60s for uploads

findings.message: Multiple retry logic without circuit breaker - prevents cascading failures
findings.suggestion: Implement circuit breaker pattern: opossum library or custom implementation

context.impact: HIGH - prevents system overload when backend down

findings.message: Network calls without retry policy - implement exponential backoff for rural connectivity resilience
findings.suggestion: Add retry with exponential backoff: retry({ maxAttempts: 3, backoff: exponential })

context.impact: CRITICAL for RuralGO - rural areas have intermittent connectivity

findings.message: Network calls without timeout - rural connections can hang indefinitely
findings.suggestion: Add timeout: { timeout: 30000 } or AbortController with 30s timeout

context.recommendation: 30s timeout for API calls, 60s for uploads

findings.message: HTTP client without connection pooling - reuse connections for performance
findings.suggestion: Configure HTTP agent with keepAlive: true, maxSockets: 50

findings.message: Network calls without error handling - unhandled rejections crash app
findings.suggestion: Wrap in try-catch or add .catch() with specific error types (NetworkError, TimeoutError)

context.impact: HIGH - unhandled network errors cause crashes

findings.message: Mutation without idempotency key - retried requests will duplicate data
findings.suggestion: Add idempotencyKey to request headers, check before processing

findings.message: Mutation endpoint without versioning - implement optimistic locking (version/etag) for conflict resolution
findings.suggestion: Add version field to DTOs, check on update, return 409 Conflict if mismatch

findings.message: Mutation endpoint without versioning - implement optimistic locking (version/etag) for conflict resolution
findings.suggestion: Add version field to DTOs, check on update, return 409 Conflict if mismatch

findings.message: Push notification without queue - direct sends fail silently, use queue (Bull/BullMQ) for retry
findings.suggestion: Implement notification queue with retry policy

findings.message: Notifications sent in loop - batch multiple sends (500 tokens/batch) for FCM efficiency
findings.suggestion: Use FCM multicast or batch send API

findings.message: Push notification without queue - direct sends fail silently, use queue (Bull/BullMQ) for retry
findings.suggestion: Implement notification queue with retry policy

findings.message: Image upload without server-side compression - compress with sharp for storage efficiency
findings.suggestion: Use sharp to resize and compress: sharp().resize(1920).jpeg({ quality: 80 })
